channel.title: [317][delta] trying to add a shop, but trading freezes
channel.description:
ok ik, adding a shop easy as like what? 1, 2? well anyway i did all the steps, (even if i dont do all the steps) and i try to trade the npc, the game loses connection and it brings the person who traded back to their spot. any idea?
thanks
